name: zapier-bridge
description: Manage and trigger Zapier Zaps, list executions, and check Zap status via provider client. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: zapier_bridge
toolDefinition.description: Manage and trigger Zapier Zaps, list executions, and check Zap status. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: list_zaps (list all Zaps), run_zap (trigger a Zap), get_zap_status (check Zap enabled/disabled), list_executions (list recent Zap executions)

zapId.description: The Zap identifier. Required for run_zap, get_zap_status, and list_executions.

status.description: Filter by Zap status: 'enabled', 'disabled', or 'all'. Optional for list_zaps, defaults to 'all'.

payload.description: JSON payload to send to the Zap. Optional for run_zap. Can be a JSON string or an object.

limit.description: Maximum number of executions to return. Optional for list_executions, defaults to 10.
